verses.name: Job 36:12
verses.text: But if they obey not, they shall perish by the sword, and they shall die without knowledge.

verses.name: Job 36:13
verses.text: But the hypocrites in heart heap up wrath: they cry not when he bindeth them.

verses.name: Job 36:14
verses.text: They die in youth, and their life is among the unclean.

verses.name: Job 36:15
verses.text: He delivereth the poor in his affliction, and openeth their ears in oppression.

verses.name: Job 36:16
verses.text: Even so would he have removed thee out of the strait into a broad place, where there is no straitness; and that which should be set on thy table should be full of fatness.
